title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 701.17 - Class gsb saline groundwaters
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 701.17 - Class gsb saline groundwaters

State Regulations

The best usage of Class GSB waters is as a receiving
water for disposal of wastes. Class GSB waters are saline groundwaters that
have a chloride concentration in excess of 1,000 milligrams per liter or a
total dissolved solids concentration in excess of 2,000 milligrams per
liter. Notes

701.17

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
